appSubtitle: Know your area's real internet speed
resultsSubtitle: Here's a look at your current internet performance.
shareSummary: I just tested my internet speed with myareaspeed! Download: {speed} Mbps, Ping: {ping} ms, Jitter: {jitter} ms. Check your speed!
aboutText1: myareaspeed is an internet speed test web application designed to provide area-specific insights and community feedback, tailored for users in Nigeria and across Africa.
aboutText2: We believe that everyone deserves a clear and accurate understanding of their internet performance, not just as a number, but in the context of their specific location and needs.
aboutText3: This project was developed by Kobowallet Innovation, a tech company dedicated to building practical solutions for everyday challenges.
aboutMissionText: Our mission is to empower internet users with transparent data and a platform to share their experiences. By crowdsourcing performance data, we aim to create a comprehensive map of internet quality, helping users make informed decisions about their service providers.
privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.
privacyDataText1: When you run a speed test, we collect the following anonymous data:
privacyDataPoint1: Speed test results (internet speed, ping, jitter).
privacyDataPoint2: Your IP address, which we use to determine your ISP and general location (city/country). We do not store your full IP address.
privacyDataPoint3: Any voluntary feedback you provide, such as location, rating, and comments. All feedback is submitted anonymously.
privacyUsageText: The anonymous data we collect is aggregated and used to power our Community Hub, showing area-specific statistics and insights. It helps everyone understand the real-world performance of different ISPs in different locations.
contactIntro: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, feedback, or a partnership inquiry, feel free to reach out.
aboutWhyUsSubtitle: We are more than just a speed test. We are a community-driven platform for internet transparency.
aboutFeature1Text: We leverage anonymous, crowdsourced data to provide a real-world view of internet performance.
aboutFeature2Text: Go beyond generic speed tests. Understand the internet quality specifically in your neighborhood.
aboutFeature3Text: Our tool is free to use, and we're committed to being transparent about how we use data to help the community.
privacyPrinciplesSubtitle: Your trust is our top priority. Our service is built on these core principles.
privacyPrinciple1Text: Your personal identity is never linked to your test results or feedback shared with the community.
privacyPrinciple2Text: Data is only used in aggregate to benefit the community and improve transparency in the telecom industry.
privacyPrinciple3Text: We will never sell your personal information to third-party advertisers or data brokers.
contactGeneralText: For general questions, feedback, or support, please don't hesitate to reach out.
contactPartnershipsText: Interested in collaborating or integrating our data? We'd love to hear from you.
contactPressText: For all media inquiries, please contact our communications team.
tooltip_speed: Measures how fast you can download data. Higher is better for streaming, downloading large files, and browsing.
tooltip_ping: Also called latency, this measures how long it takes for a signal to travel to a server and back. Lower is better for online gaming and real-time communication.
tooltip_jitter: Measures the variation in your ping time. Lower jitter means a more stable and consistent connection, crucial for video calls and gaming.
confirmTestAgainMessage: Are you sure you want to start a new test? Your current results will be lost.
shareExperienceSubtitle: Share your anonymous feedback to help others understand the internet quality in your area.
commentPlaceholder: E.g., Great for streaming, but drops during peak hours...
feedbackSubmittedText: Your feedback has been submitted and will help the community.
spamCommentError: Your comment seems to contain spam or links. Please remove them and try again.
rateLimitError: You are submitting feedback too quickly. Please wait a few minutes.
communitySearchSubtitle: See what people are saying about internet performance in different areas.
searchPlaceholder: Search by city, area, or ISP...
noFeedbackSubtitle: There's no feedback for this area yet. Be the first to share your experience after running a speed test!
areaInsightsSubtitle: Curious about the internet speed in a specific area? Look up real user feedback.
jitterExplainedWhatText: Jitter is the variation in the time delay between when a signal is sent and when it's received. In simpler terms, it measures the inconsistency of your ping. A low, stable ping is great, but high jitter means your connection is unstable, causing unpredictable spikes in latency.
jitterExplainedWhyText: High jitter is a major cause of lag in online games, choppy audio in VoIP calls (like WhatsApp or Zoom), and buffering during video streams. For real-time activities, a stable connection (low jitter) is often more important than raw speed.
seeOthersSayingSubtitle: Explore real-world internet performance in your area and help others by sharing your own experience.
